publicityLines.line: After that, you could:
order 1 credit card Visa Classic * or 1 Prepaid Card;
open two additional current accounts;
turn your accounts into a joint account (max. 2 account holders per pack);
order a bank card for each account holder and for each account.
All of this is included in your Comfort Pack!
Current account and bank card
Visa Classic or prepaid card included *
Once your request has been accepted and confirmed, you will enjoy the benefits of a current account and a bank card, but also:
access to your bank online and via your mobile with Easy Banking Web and Easy Banking App **;
expert advice from our advisers in our branches and remotely by phone and digital channels (Easy Banking Centre).
Connecting 12 times to Easy Banking App = 1 month refunded
12 payments using MasterCard Gold = 1 month refunded
1 automatic savings transfer for 50 euros per month (minimum 500 euros per year) = 1 month refunded
So that alone makes 3 months of refunds, which is 25% of the fees for your Premium Pack!
Do this each year by 31 December and you will receive the refund in February
After that, you could:
order up to 2 MasterCard Gold * credit cards (or Visa Classic * or Prepaid Cards if you prefer);
open two additional current accounts;
turn your accounts into a joint account (max. 2 account holders per pack);
order a bank card for each account holder and for each account.
All of this is included in your Premium Pack!
All the benefits of the Comfort Pack
MasterCard Gold card(s) with a standard spending limit of 5,000 euros and all insurance relating to the card *
Bonus to get back up to 100% of the cost of your Premium Pack
Once your request has been accepted and confirmed, you will enjoy the benefits of a current account and a bank card, but also:
free replacements for your cards if they are lost or stolen;
access to your bank online and via your mobile with Easy Banking Web and Easy Banking App **;
expert advice from our advisers in our branches and remotely by phone and digital channels (Easy Banking Centre).
